person.persName: Washington Carlton (Hancock County tailor and hotel keeper)

body.p: A Virginia-born, Kentucky tailor and hotel keeper. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Elizabeth Stewart Carlton. Father of Ann Elizabeth Carlton Vickers, Oletha P. Carlton, Virginia F. Carlton, Edmonia Duvall Carlton Vickers, Thomas D. Carlton, Mary F. Carlton, Joseph W. Carlton, Virginia F. Carlton, and William S. Carlton.
